OOC: Rodimus isn't in Atlantis. He is at an old Maximal base from years bef=
ore. Some time ago we jumped ahead several years in this RPGs story. That i=
s when it became NBW: Age of Wars. The base he is at is from before that. W=
hen it was just some Maximals and Predacons fighting out of downed ships, b=
efore the colonization.

--- On Mon, 6/23/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus=
@...> wrote:

From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
Subject:=
 Re: The Minions watch . . .
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, June =
23, 2008, 4:51 PM










> Nightstrike/ darkfate:
> 
> Nightsrike opened=
 comlink with Cyclonus "Nightrsike and 
> Darkfate to Cyclonus, we're headi=
ng towards Atlantis to 
> assist our troops"
=A0
Cyclonus paused for a mome=
nt, wondering what had been happening in Atlantis. But then again he could =
perhaps use this development to their advantage. With the loss of the matri=
x, perhaps victory could be salvaged with the destruction of one of the Max=
imal Bases. 
=A0
=93Understood.=94 Cyclonus said after a moment or two of r=
eflection. =93Acquire all the data in their computer banks, and then detona=
te the base. There are no survivors.=94 Cyclonus=92 voice was calm and yet =
authoritative. 
=A0
(Tag Nightstrike/ Darkfate)
=A0
=93Sir.=94 Scourge=92s =
voice crackled over the communication link between he and Cyclonus, =93I ha=
ve not located Rodiums yet, but he appears to be making his way towards the=
 Maximal base in Atlantis.=94 Scourge grunted before he continued, =93Any c=
hange in orders?=94 
=A0
Cyclonus chuckled very lightly, =93No - only an ad=
dition. It would seem that the other minions have journeyed to Atlantis as =
well. Utilize them as required. They are tasked with mirroring the Maximal =
database and destroying the compound. I am sure that would fit in with my o=
rders to you as well?=94
=A0
Laughter came over the com channel from Scourg=
e to Cyclonus, =93Yes sir it would, it would indeed.=94 
=A0
The laughter b=
ecame darker and more evil as the channel closed leaving Cyclonus in silenc=
e. With a thought he had his minions press the attack on the Balack Fortres=
s=85
=A0
(To be continued . . . )
=A0
Preston
(Da=92minion)
 













=
